A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible film\, extremely boring and alot of stupid jokes that don't hit the mark\, you just don't care about all these new characters because they're all so bland. It's like Disney has managed to hypnotise people into thinking that these new star wars films are good or even watchable. They have dumbed down Star Wars to appeal to the mass market and it has obviously worked with the amount of people going to see this film\, it's a real shame.
